title: Set Dilkhush section to use Photo #1

requirements.text: Update the Dilkhush founder photo so that the image shown under the "Dilkhush" card in the "Meet the Owners" section uses Photo #1 (the photo where he is sitting in a car wearing a black shirt). This update must also reflect anywhere else the app uses the Dilkhush founder image constants (e.g., header avatar and About section).

quotes: Haan, Dilkhush ke niche photo number 1 laga do

acceptanceCriteria: In the "Meet the Owners" section, the Dilkhush card displays Photo #1 (car seated, black shirt).
The header avatar and About section Dilkhush photo also show the same updated Photo #1 (since they use the same Dilkhush image constants).
No backend changes are required to load the image; it is served as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated/.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui (compose instead).
Do not route image serving through the backend canister; use static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/.
nonGoals: Do not change Rohit's photo or any other owner/founder photo configuration beyond what is necessary to set Dilkhush to Photo #1.

edits: Replace the Dilkhush square headshot with Photo #1 (founder-dilkhush.dim_512x512.jpg > founder-dilkhush.dim_512x512.jpg)
Replace the small Dilkhush square headshot with Photo #1 (founder-dilkhush.dim_128x128.jpg > founder-dilkhush.dim_128x128.jpg)
